title: Protests shake Mexico after officials say missing students killed
text:
Protests shake Mexico after officials say missing students killed Friday, April 27, 2018 - 01:16
Protests erupted in Guadalajara, Mexico after authorities said three missing students were killed last month in the western state of Jalisco and their bodies dissolved in acid after criminals confused them with members of a rival gang.
Protests erupted in Guadalajara, Mexico after authorities said three missing students were killed last month in the western state of Jalisco and their bodies dissolved in acid after criminals confused them with members of a rival gang. //reut.rs/2KhuhXo
